name: adidas Men's Kaptir 2.0 Running Shoe
short_description: Synthetic sole Men's' lightweight running sneakers for everyday wear FLEXIBLE UPPER: Soft textile upper is stretchy and comfortable CUSHIONED MIDSOLE: Cloudfoam midsole for step-in comfort and superior cushioning RUBBER INSERTS: Rubber inserts on the outsole add traction MADE WITH RECYCLED CONTENT: Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste
product_description: Roll through your day in total comfort. These adidas running-inspired shoes for men are made with a pillow-soft Cloudfoam midsole. A knit upper provides a snug, sock-like fit.

name: PUMA Women's Better Foam Adore Running Shoe, Intense Red Team Gold, 10
short_description: 100% Textile Rubber sole Platform measures approximately 1 inches RECYCLED PERFORMANCE MESH: Main body material is created from 100% recycled polyester – sustainable and comfortable . UNIQUE LACING: caging detail that highlights a unique lacing system. Upper BETTER FOAM: Created using 50% bio-base sugarcane EVA and 3% reground rubber. Better foam is light on your feet, and on the environment. SUSTAINABLE INSOLE: Sustainable insole containing 20% recycled foam, 5% bio-based material, 100% recycled mesh top layer. Also features an additive. Midsole ZONED RUBBER: Zoned rubber for outsole traction during training Outsole
product_description: Introducing the BETTER FOAM Adore Wn’s. This style is built with a sustainable focus, and is a women’s specific offering- taking design language from our new Forever Luxe Trainer. The Adore features a recycled mesh upper and is highlight by its unique wide set lacing. This shoe is designed with our new BETTER FOAM midsole compound that is light on your feet, and on the environment- BETTER FOAM is created with 50% bio-based sugarcane EVA. The BETTER FOAM Adore Wn’s utilizes a new sustainable insole containing recycled/bio-based foam content, and has an benefit. This shoe is part of our Forever Better campaign, which focuses on our brand’s initiative to be Better in all walks of life. Better Materials. Better Foam. Forever Better.

name: ASICS Women's Gel-Kayano Lite 2 Running Shoes
short_description: Guidance Line¬†Midsole Technology - Vertical flex groove decouples the tooling along the line of progression for enhanced gait efficiency.
product_description: The GEL-KAYANO LITE 2 running shoe embraces a sound earth. With a focus on sustainability, this shoe keeps your step stable and your mind light. The engineered mesh upper is made with a higher percentage of recycled materials than the previous version. Its structure also targets key support zones to increase stability. FLYTEFOAM cushioning is made from organically derived materials. This lightweight foam improves shock absorption during the landing phase of your stride. The 3D SPACE CONSTRUCTION feature addresses the gait differences of male and female runners. It's designed to reduce overpronation, which keeps your foot supported.

This is especially true if you play with your partner in doubles.

name: Botas - Attack - Men's Ice Hockey Skates | Made in Europe (Czech Republic) | JUST LAUNCHED 2021
short_description: The new model of Ice skates BOTAS ATTACK 181 is designed for recreational skating and beginning ice-hockey players. The model is made of a dynamic cut and attractive black-and-silver printed graphic. The overall quality reinforcement assures overall resistance and fixation of the boot, protecting against impact and puck hits, and the ankle padding with sufficient inside space especially in the boot front add excellent comfort. The plastic tip reliably protects the toes against impact. The anatomically shaped tongue with under-lacing reinforcement assure increased vamp protection. The overall quality reinforcement assures overall resistance and fixation of the boot, protecting against impact and puck hits, and the ankle padding with sufficient inside space especially in the boot front add excellent comfort. product_description: The new model of junior Ice skates BOTAS ATTACK 181 is designed for recreational skating and beginning ice-hockey players. The model is made of a dynamic cut and attractive black-and-silver printed graphic. The overall quality reinforcement assures overall resistance and fixation of the boot, protecting against impact and puck hits, and the ankle padding with sufficient inside space especially in the boot front add excellent comfort. The plastic tip reliably protects the toes against impact. The anatomically shaped tongue with under-lacing reinforcement assure increased vamp protection. The skating complex is supplied with black low-profile sole with integrated CLIMA AIR for ventilation of the boot inside and quality skate of resistant plastics with stainless steel blade.

name: CCM Super Tacks 9350 Senior Ice Hockey Skates
short_description: Skate size is typically 1.5 sizes lower than US shoe size. Example if you wear a shoe size 10.5 you will be a skate size 9. CCM Hockey is constantly pushing the boundaries when it comes to ice hockey skate innovation and this time is no different with the CCM Super Tacks 9350 Senior Hockey Skates! Designed and manufactured to cater to a wide range of players, the Super Tacks 9350 Skates offer the complete package of performance, comfort, and efficiency. Starting out with the Quarter Package of the Super Tacks 9350 Skates, a Reinforced 3D Injected boot is a new ergonomic boot-shaping system that provides great comfort and durability. This skate also comes with a stiffness performance index of 125 which makes this skate a solid core for a good skating experience. Up at the tongue of the Super Tacks 9350 skates, a 7mm Felt tongue with embossed lace-bite protection is utilized to provide comfort and protection in this area. Next on the liner, an HD Microfiber is used specifically to provide a comfortable fit that is designed to be highly resistant to wear. Finally down on the bottom section of the Super Tacks, the footbed is CCM’s very own footbed designed to provide further support and comfort for the goaltender. Flipping around to the outside to the holder and runner, CCMs Speedblade is a non-replaceable, pre-sharpened stainless steel blade with an elevated holder for an increased attack angle.

name: No Sweat Hockey Helmet Sweat Liner Made in The USA - Moisture Wicking Patented Technology - Disposable Sweatband - Keep Sweat Out of Eyes
short_description: Forget the sweat. The NoSweat Helmet Liner seals in sweat from your helmet to keep you cool and dry and performing at your best. Patented Sweat-Lock technology instantly absorbs and wicks sweat to keep it out of your eyes, while your helmet looks and smells like new. Made of thin, soft, lightweight material, NoSweat is comfortable and gentle on your skin and easy to apply inside the front and back of your helmet. Peel It. Stick It. NoSweat!
